oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Capitol Hill Redevelopment Area, c.1949
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the Captiol Hill redevelopment area, c.1949. Launched in 1949 with demolition ceremonies in 1953, the Capitol Hill Redevelopment Project was to become the first urban renewal plan funded by Congress. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
